text: "Swordsman World 3" mobile game privacy policy
Kind tips
Welcome to use "Swordsman World 3" mobile game!
We attach great importance to protecting your personal information and privacy.
You can learn about the situation of our collection, use, and storage of user information through "Swordsman World 3 Privacy Policy", and the relevant rights you enjoy.
Please read carefully and fully understand the relevant content:
1. In order to provide you with game services, we will collect, use, and store the necessary information based on "Swordsman World 3 Privacy Policy".
label: First Party Collection Information

text: In order to provide you with game entertainment services and interactive services with players, we need to collect information such as your equipment information, login logs.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect information such as equipment information and login logs to provide services.

text: 2. In order to achieve business functions or necessary in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, we will collect and use your sensitive personal information when you use specific functions or services.Astimore face recognition function for some users (based on specific game strategies).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: In specific functions or services, collect and use your sensitive information to achieve business functions or need to be in accordance with laws and regulations.

text: In the process of face recognition function, we will obtain your face images and video information. The above -mentioned face verification information is mainly compared with the user's real -name authentication information and real facial information with the data source of the public security authority.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: In the process of face recognition function, the collector's face image and video information are compared with the data source of the Public Security's authoritative data platform.

text: 3. In order to achieve business functions or necessary in accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, we may apply for opening your equipment permissions when you use specific functions or services.It will be opened by default. Only after your explicit authorization will use it when you implement specific functions or services, you can also withdraw authorization.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: It may be that you can apply for the device authority with a specific function or service, but it will not be opened by default, and the license can be withdrawn in the future.

text: 4. You can access, correct and delete your personal information, and you can also withdraw authorization consent, cancel account number, complain report, and adjust other privacy settings.
label: Edit/Control

text: 5. We have taken security measures that meet industry standards to protect your personal information.
label: Data Security

text: 6. If you are a minor, please and your guardian to read this privacy policy carefully, and use our service or provide personal information to us under the premise of obtaining the consent of your guardian.
label: Specific Audiences

text: Please read the full version of "Swordsman World 3 User Agreement" and "Swordsman World 3 Privacy Policy" for details.

If you agree with the Swordsman World 3 User Agreement and "Swordsman World 3 Privacy Policy", please click "Agree" to start using our products and services. We will do our best to protect your personal information security.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: Please click "Agree" to start using our products and services.

text: "Swordsman World 3" privacy policy
Release date of this version: December 20, 2021
label: Policy Change

text: Effective date: December 21, 2021

text: Welcome to use "Wuhan Xishanju Shiyou Technology Co., Ltd." and its affiliates (Chengdu Xishanju Shiyou Technology Co., Ltd., Zhuhai Xishanju Shiyou Technology Co., Ltd., Zhuhai Xishanju Digital Technology Co., Ltd., Beijing Jinshan Digital Entertainment Technology Co., Ltd.Company, Chengdu Jinshan Digital Entertainment Technology Co., Ltd., Zhuhai Xishanju Digital Technology Co., Ltd., Zhuhai Jinshan Digital Network Technology Co., Ltd., hereinafter referred to as "We" or "Xishanju") operation "Swordsman World 3" mobile game (hereinafter referred to as"This product").

This "Privacy Policy" will strive to explain the policies and measures of this product in collecting, using, managing, and protecting your personal information through the easy -to -understand and concise text expression, as well as the visits and updates we provide for you, Delete and protect this information.

It is clear to you that this "Privacy Policy" is an integral part of the "Jinshan Online Privacy Policy". For example, this "Privacy Policy" and "Jinshan Online Privacy Policy" conflict, which are subject to this privacy policy.
If you are at the age of 14, you should apply "Child Privacy Policy" at the same time, please pay special attention.
label: Specific Audiences

text: The following "you", if there is no special explanation, refers to the guardian who is under the age of fourteen years old or a user who is 14 years old.

Before using the product services we provided, we recommend that you carefully read the "Privacy Policy" (especially the bold clauses that are directly related to your rights, involving your personal sensitive information), and then decide whether to use us to use us to use us to our direction.For this product service, please know that this policy is only applicable to the information collected to you through this product, and it is not applicable to the third -party collected by the third party that provides you to the product or service.information.

If you do not agree with any content of this policy, we will not be able to provide you with this product service (hereinafter referred to as "service"), you should immediately stop using our services.
When you agree with this policy, you have agreed that we have agreed to process your relevant information in accordance with this policy.
When you agree to use our services, it means you have agreed that we have dealt with your relevant personal information in accordance with this policy.
The main content of this "Privacy Policy" is as follows:
1. How do we collect and use personal information
2. Sharing, transfer and public disclosure of personal information
Third, the use of cookies and similar technologies
Fourth, the protection of personal information
5. Your right to personal information
6. Special protection for personal information of minors (including children)

8. Application and dispute resolution of law
Nine, contact us
10. Keyword description

You can view this privacy policy in the following way:

2. The privacy policy column of this product starts interface;
3. The user's privacy policy announced in the announcement column of this product;
4. When the content of the privacy policy is updated, we will pop up the updated privacy policy after you start the product next time, and re -consults you;

Important
rewrite: When the content of privacy policy is updated, we will re -solicit your consent by popping up a new way of privacy policy.

text: 1. How do we collect and use your personal information
(1) We will collect and obtain your personal information through the following channels:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1. The information you provide.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (1) The information you provided to us when you register the game account or use this product.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (2) The information stored when you use this product.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2. Your information that is legally shared by a third party.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 3. The information that we obtain legally obtained in the process of providing you, if you collect, summarize, and record information when using this product.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (2) We will collect and use your personal information for the following goals:
label: Usage
First Party Collection Information

text: (1) Help you complete the registration and login

In order to facilitate us to provide you with continuous and stable services and ensure the security of your services you provide, you need to use the Jinshan Pass account that you enjoy the right to use as the account of this product. When you register for the Jinshan Pass, you need to provide it with you to provide providedBasic registration information, including the account name you prepared, the password you created, your email (unnecessary), the real -name mobile phone number under your own name, we will use the way to send a SMS verification code to help verify your identityEssence
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you register for the Jinshan Pass, collect the account name of the account you are preparing, the password created, the email address (unnecessary), the real -name mobile phone number under your own name, and use the SMS verification code to assist the verification identity.

text: In order to provide you with better services and improve product experience, when you log in to this product, we will collect your avatars, nicknames, and IDs for in -product information display.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you log in, we collect your avatars, nicknames, and IDs for in -product information display.

text: We may provide you with relevant permissions depending on the specific situation of the product so that you can set the relevant information about whether the relevant information described before.
label: Edit/Control

text: You can also use the account of the third -party platform recognized by Xishanju to log in to this product. When you log in to this product with the account of the third -party platform recognized by Xishanju, we will obtain the relevant information under these accounts based on your authorization (for example:Username, nickname, avatar, specifically your authorization content), is used to help you complete login and realize a better gaming entertainment experience.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When registering and logging in with a third -party account, visit and collect your personal information after your authorization.

text: (2) Realize real -name authentication and the integration of people's certificates

In accordance with relevant laws and regulations and regulatory requirements, or in order to meet the needs of user identity, guarantee systems and service security, and other specific service functions, we need to collect your name, certificate type, and document number.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: At the same time, in order to achieve the purpose of real -name authentication, you agree and authorize us to provide, inquire, and check your aforementioned identity information for the relevant real -name certification agencies (such as government departments).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: You agree and authorize us to verify your identity by yourself or entrust our third parties to verify your identity.

text: Please note that your identity information is a personal sensitive information. Please provide it with caution. If you do not provide such information, you will be unable to register, log in to this product or be subject to corresponding restrictions in the process of using this product.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not provide identity information, you will be unable to register, log in to this product or be limited.

text: At the same time, in order to realize the combination of human certificates or provide online game protection of minors and promote the healthy online game of minors, we may enable face recognition functions in some games or for some users (based on specific game strategies).
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We may use face recognition functions to achieve certification unity or provide online game protection of minors.

text: In the process of face recognition, we will obtain your face image and video information. The above -mentioned face recognition is mainly to compare the user real -name authentication information and real facial information with the data source of the Public Security Authoritative Data Platform.Face verification information is a personal sensitive information. Please provide it with caution. If you do not refuse to perform face recognition, you will be restricted in the process of using this product.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: We will compare your face image and video information with the data source of the Public Security Data Platform.If you refuse face recognition, you will be limited to using this product.

text: (3) Help you complete the order, pay, recharge, and deliver the goods or services to you

If you buy the paid service of this product, when you settle the content of the service content you choose, the order will stipulate the order number, the content you purchased, the amount you should pay, the recharge record and payment method so that you can inquireYour transaction records and protection of your transaction security are necessary for the above information to achieve paid service functions.

First Party Collection Information

text: The recharge record and consumption record are sensitive information. Collecting the above information is necessary to achieve the consumption function of our game products, otherwise the transaction will not be completed.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

Important
